pr_title: A few minor wording adjustments for the new Users pages

timeline.message: A few minor wording adjustments/fixes for the new Users pages

timeline.bodyText:
I think this was meant in a different way: "an email address to contact the user" "contact email".
I guess we should use something like "The user's email address." (same for the Full Name)
timeline.author: bernd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,7 +25,7 @@ const EmailFormGroup = () => (
                    maxLength={254}
                    type="email"
                    required
-                   help="Give the contact email address." />
+                   help="Give the contact an email address." />

replies.bodyText: Ahh yes, good point. I've adjusted it. How does it look now in 7a9cccf?
replies.author: danotorrey

timeline.message: Use more appropriate wording for user fields
